triples.name: Doxastic Logic
triples.relevance: The paper introduces conditional doxastic actions by extending doxastic logic with conditional reasoning capabilities.

triples.name: Belief Revision
triples.relevance: The paper incorporates ideas from belief revision theory to handle how conditional beliefs change after actions.

triples.name: Dynamic Logic
triples.relevance: The paper extends the dynamic logic framework for epistemic actions to handle conditional doxastic reasoning.

triples.name: Dynamic Epistemic Logic
triples.relevance: The paper builds upon dynamic epistemic logic which combines dynamic logic with knowledge and belief reasoning.

triples.name: Epistemic Modal Logic
triples.relevance: The paper extends epistemic modal logic concepts to create a conditional doxastic logic framework.
